name: Zwayam
description:
India's most popular SaaS based hiring platform started by industry practitioners and meant for large and mid-market enterprises, with a light version for SMEs. 

Zwayam is an end-to-end recruitment automation software - a process enabler and helps automate all stages of hiring from sourcing to onboarding. 

Zwayam uses  contemporary technologies like AI, ML and NLP allowing clients to use technology to change the way they hire.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Bringing in the new.
ShortDescription: Zwayam is an end-to-end recruitment automation software - a process enabler and helps automate all stages of hiring from sourcing to onboarding.
enhanced_description: Zwayam is India's prominent SaaS-based, end-to-end recruitment automation platform. Developed by industry practitioners, it is designed for large and mid-market enterprises, with a specialized light version available for SMEs. The platform automates all stages of the hiring process, from initial talent sourcing and candidate engagement to comprehensive applicant tracking and final onboarding. Zwayam leverages contemporary technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to enable clients to optimize and transform their hiring methodologies.
key_use_cases: Automating the entire recruitment lifecycle from sourcing to onboarding
Building and enhancing employer branding and talent branding efforts
Engaging and managing candidates effectively throughout the hiring process
Conducting pre-employment screening, including background checks and testing
Efficiently tracking applicants via an Applicant Tracking System (ATS)
Streamlining the new hire onboarding experience
Applying AI, ML, and NLP for data-driven and efficient hiring practices
competitive_advantages: Identified as India's most popular SaaS-based hiring platform
Developed by industry practitioners, indicating deep domain expertise
Offers comprehensive, end-to-end recruitment automation covering all stages from sourcing to onboarding
Integrates contemporary technologies like AI, ML, and NLP for advanced hiring capabilities
roi_benefits: Facilitate the hiring of top talent
scalability_features: Designed to cater to large, mid-market, and small enterprises with tailored versions
